mapper.select: select products.proNo, products.title, products.catNo, categories.catName, products.userNo, products.nickname, products.price, products.content, products.tags, products.wdate, products.able from products, categories where products.catNo = categories.catNo and concat(products.title,products.tags,products.content) like concat('%',#{word},'%') and (products.able != 0 and products.condit!="판매완료");

select products.proNo, products.title, products.catNo, categories.catName, products.userNo, products.nickname, products.price, products.content, products.tags, products.wdate, products.able from products, categories where products.catNo = categories.catNo and able != 0 order by wdate desc;

select products.proNo, products.title, products.catNo, categories.catName, products.userNo, products.nickname, products.price, products.content, products.tags, products.wdate, products.able from products, categories where products.catNo = categories.catNo and proNo = #{proNo} and able != 0;
select * from products where able != 0 order by wdate desc limit 1;

select products.proNo, products.title, products.catNo, categories.catName, products.userNo, products.nickname, products.price, products.content, products.tags, products.wdate, products.able from products, categories where products.catNo = categories.catNo and products.catNo = #{catNo} and able != 0 order by wdate desc;
mapper.insert: insert into products(title, catNo, userNo, nickname, price, content, tags) values(#{title},#{catNo},#{userNo},#{nickname},#{price},#{content},#{tags});
mapper.update: update products set title=#{title}, catNo=#{catNo}, condit=#{condit}, price=#{price}, content=#{content}, tags=#{tags} where proNo = #{proNo};
update products set able=0 where proNo = #{proNo};
